name: Gameboy 3D
description:
This is Gameboy, a very popular game console back in 90â€™s

The first handheld in the Game Boy family, it was first released in Japan in April 1989.


I have spent 3 hours building this using various shapes,

drop shadow, inner shadow, layer blur, and everything you see here is made completely in Figma.


I enjoyed every bit of the process, it was like re-living those childhood moments when I used to butter up my friend so that i could some time playing on this!


Special thanks to @saptarshipr, for igniting the spark and idea behind creating this. You are genius!



Wanna know anything more? Connect with me on:


https://www.instagram.com/thenikhilnambiar/
